promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive epic gecko electric-type pokemon wearing golden bracers. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldvoltura, a a massive epic gecko electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Electrodash, Gentle Song. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "electric" or "Goldvoltura". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, gecko-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This mountain dweller harnesses the power of thunderstorms to charge its body. It soothes foes with a serene melody before blitzing them in a lightning fast strike.
